members.name: Intel Corporation
members.other_information: Intel is a multinational corporation known for designing and manufacturing semiconductor chips and other related products. Intel has a significant presence in Folsom, with a large campus that houses research, development, and manufacturing facilities.

members.name: Micron Technology, Inc.
members.other_information: Micron is major player in the semiconductor industry, specializing in memory and storage solutions. Micron has operations in Folsom, including research and development facilities focused on advancing memory technologies.

members.name: Verizon
members.other_information: Verizon Communications is a telecommunications company providing wireless communication services, internet access, and other related products and services. Verizon has a significant presence in Folsom, serving both residential and business customers in the area.

members.name: PowerSchool
members.other_information: PowerSchool is a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions for K-12 education. Headquartered in Folsom, PowerSchool offers a comprehensive suite of products and services designed to streamline school operations, improve student outcomes, and enhance the educational experience.

members.name: Waste Connections
members.other_information: Waste Connections is a waste management company providing collection, disposal, recycling, and other environmental services. With operations across North America, Waste Connections serves residential, commercial, industrial, and municipal customers in Folsom and surrounding areas.

members.name: California Independent System Operator (CAISO)
members.other_information: CAISO is a nonprofit public benefit corporation that manages the flow of electricity across the high-voltage power grid for most of California and a small part of Nevada. Located in Folsom, CAISO plays a crucial role in ensuring the reliability and stability of the state's electrical grid.

members.name: Caliber Home Loans
members.other_information: Caliber Home Loans is a full-service mortgage banking company offering home loans and refinancing options to customers.
